an5.152:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato sunantopi saddhammam abhabbo niyamam okkamitum kusalesu dhammesu sammattam.
an5.152:1.3: Katham paribhoti, kathikam paribhoti, attanam paribhoti, duppanno hoti jalo elamugo, anannate annatamani hoti.
an5.152:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato sunantopi saddhammam abhabbo niyamam okkamitum kusalesu dhammesu sammattam.
an5.152:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato sunanto saddhammam bhabbo niyamam okkamitum kusalesu dhammesu sammattam.
an5.152:2.3: Na katham paribhoti, na kathikam paribhoti, na attanam paribhoti, pannava hoti ajalo anelamugo, na anannate annatamani hoti.
an5.152:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato sunanto saddhammam bhabbo niyamam okkamitum kusalesu dhammesu sammattan”ti.
